backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining dish and health types, storing recipes in a map, and returning filtered or augmented recommendations including optional star meal logic based on favorite food.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of all major frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes with global background and text styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, favicon, root div, and loading the main React module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing form state, recommendation results, and layout including header, hero, and decorative imagery.
Image wrapper that hides itself when loading fails to prevent broken-image UI.
frontend/src/components/DishImage.tsx: Dish image component that resolves static asset paths, resets error state on change, and shows a fallback when unavailable.
Comprehensive health input form with condition and allergy management, validation, and favorite food field, calling the recommendations hook.
frontend/src/components/ResultsView.tsx: Displays user health info and recommended dishes, including conditions, allergies, and a star-meal tag.
frontend/src/components/SoundtrackContro: Provides play, pause, volume, and mute controls for background music with error handling and saved preferences.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider handling login, stored identities, and auth client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a mutation hook that calls the backend to fetch food recommendations based on user health data.
frontend/src/hooks/useSoundtrackPreferen: Manages soundtrack settings (enabled, volume, mute) with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Contains Tailwind config and custom CSS variables defining a health-themed light and dark color palette.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Formats bigint nutrition values into readable strings with fallback handling.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Validates health form inputs for age, weight, blood pressure, and logical constraints.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, React Query, and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
